com.mygdx.game

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that represents a single Level and contains all the information needed for the game to be "playable"

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DoorBody bluedoorbody
      Blue door body used in Box2D.
      DoorBody reddoorbody
      Red door body used in Box2D.

        gamescreen - the game screen
        mappath - a string with all information needed to load the map of the level being defined
